```{r load corpus, include=FALSE}
l_star_h_types = c("L*H", "^[L*]H", "L*^[H]", "^[L*H]")

# Load Corpus
m_corpus <- get_m_corpus("../data/m_corpus.csv")  %>%
  # Consolidate nuc_contour based on observation and types of register shift.
  mutate(
    nuc_contour =
      if_else(
        nuc_contour == "^[L*H %]" | nuc_contour == "^[L*H L%]",
        "^[L*H] %",
        if_else(nuc_contour == "L*^[H L%]", "L*^[H] %", nuc_contour)
      ),
    acc_phon =
      factor(
        str_replace(nuc_contour,
                    "\\s%$|\\sL%$",
                    ""),
        levels = c("H*", "L*H", ">H*", "^[L*]H", "L*^[H]", "^[L*H]")
      ),
    fin_phon = str_replace_all(fin_phon, "L%]|%]", "%"),
    fin_phon = factor(fin_phon, levels=unique(fin_phon))
  ) %>%
  # Select only columns for analysis
  select(
    speaker,
    gender,
    mode,
    prompt,
    acc_phon,
    fin_phon,
    h_f0) %>% 
  filter(acc_phon %in% l_star_h_types)  %>% 
  mutate(acc_phon = factor(acc_phon,
                           levels = l_star_h_types)
         )
```

- initial model raises a singularity issue warning.
- Singularity only disappears in intercepts-only model without (1|prompt)

#### `h_f0 ~ mode + fin_phon + gender + (1 + mode | speaker)`

```{r run initial model,  fig.height=3, fig.width=9, tidy = TRUE}
# run model
h_f0_model <-
  lmer(h_f0 ~ mode + fin_phon + gender + (1 + mode | speaker),
       data = m_corpus,
        control = lmerControl(
          optimizer = "optimx",
          calc.derivs = FALSE,
          optCtrl = list(
            method = "nlminb",
            starttests = FALSE,
            kkt = FALSE
          )
        )
      )
summariseLME(h_f0_model, run_step = TRUE,
              write = "../output_model_anovas/Mode_h_f0_anova.csv")
#              
```

```{r make tidy model, fig.height=3, fig.width=9, tidy = TRUE}

h_f0_model.tidy <- printTidyModel(h_f0_model,
                                write_r2="../output/Mode_h_f0"
                                )
h_f0_model.tidy$r2

```

```{r do pairwise analysis, fig.height=3, fig.width=9, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, tidy = TRUE}

charts <- getModelFixedFX(
```
